title: adguard-5.8+Crack
description:
Program name: Adguard
Version: 5.8
Release date: November 1, 2013
Language: English, Japanese, Portguese, German, Spanish, Serbian, Russian
Website:
OS: Windows
File size: 1.4 Mb

A few days ago, Performix LLC released a new version of Internet filter Adguard. One of the most noticeable changes in the versions is a filtration of https traffic. Now Adguard can block advertisements in e-mail web interfaces, social networks, chats & etc. Implementation of a new network driver made it possible to fix most of the known conflicts with third-party software. 

Adguard is a popular Internet filter that blocks ads, pop-ups, phishing & malicious websites. While working silently in the background, it automatically removes advertisements from the web pages you visit, thereby saving your traffic and reducing the page loading time. The program supports both 32x and 64x Windows versions, and it works with all popular browsers. 

Key features of Adguard:

1. Saves time and nerves;
2. Works with all popular browsers;
3. Easy to use, works just out of the box, needs no tuning or customization;
4. Comes with a browser module for manual ad blocking;
5. Updated regularly;
6. Works on 32x and 64x Windows versions.

Release notes for 5.8:

Added:
+ Improved initial setup wizard 
+ Added "useful ads" filter 
+ Tor browser support 

Fixed:
- Protection level setting is removed 
- Fixed some minor compatibility issues 
- Improved filtered pages source code readability
